data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Dar es Salaam prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gujarati Creole people.
Spirit, make the church in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Dar es Salaam who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Dar es Salaam
